caption.title: Habitat suitability of common ragweed ( A. artemisiifolia) (A–C), perennial ragweed ( A. psilostachya) (D–F) and giant ragweed ( A. trifida) (G–I) in Europe under current climate conditions, and future climates (projections for years 2070–2099) assuming RCP 6.0 and RCP 8.5.
caption.p: Maps show average MAXENT values, derived from 15 replicates. Thresholds for HAR areas for each species are indicated graphically on the color bar (e.g., “HAR Aa” shows the HAR threshold value for A. artemisiifolia).
